content.description:
Kind of a one-move wonder.

Climb up the wall on pockets with a tricky move to reach the slabby holds.
content.location: Right side of the West face of the 'Solarium Boulder'

content.description: Sit start with right hand on a sidepull and left hand on an undercling. Work left through a crux move to join Rendezvous with an Alien.
content.location: Just to the right of Rendezvous with an Alien.

content.description: Starting with a left hand on the arete of Beam Me Up Scottie, traverse right and finish on Western Round Up.
content.location: Left arete of the west face of the Solarium boulder

content.description:
Just to the right of the arete (Beam Me Up Scottie), crouch-start on some big edges and head up and slightly right.  Climb past a couple sets of thin pockets and make a toss for the lip.  Unlocking the sequence is the crux.

An area classic and a must-do for the grade.
content.location: West face of the 'Solarium Boulder', left of center, just right of the left arete.

content.description: Starts on the curving sidepull of 'Redrum' and swings left from the cool rib of that problem using a small undercling and a terrible pinch out left to a good hold at the lip near 'Rendezvous'. Then a move down onto the pinchy underclings and top out. V11 from the sit-start off of the underclings as for 'Redrum Sit'.
content.location:
Starts on Redrum and finished on

Rendezvous With an Alien

, in the cave on the back or uphill side of the Solarium boulder.

content.description:
On the east face of the 'Solarium Boulder', sit-start at the left side of the boulder.  Climb up and right to a flake and traverse along the lip to the left of

Redrum

.

Sit start with underclings or an undercling plus a low crimp. Make a big move and match hands to join the original start of Redrum.

I was told the undercling for the 2nd move broke off in 2012, but there is another (slighly worse) undercling that can be used.

On the overhanging East face of the 'Solarium Boulder', start either squatted on the big "banana hold" (V7) or as a harder SDS on the underclings (V10).  Bust some hard moves out to the lip utilizing the pinches and ribs.

Either version is a sought after prize at the Happies.

Climb the arete left of

Solarium

on good positive holds until a tricky move is made near the top.
content.location: Left side of Solarium Boulder West Face
